attributes.action: Give Sean Hodges( who was wrongly imprisoned for 27 years ) the compensation that is owed to him
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Sean Hodges , wrongly imprisoned for 27 years, 16 years down to the lack of DNA technologies the last 11 down to incompetence and indifference i.e. lying and saying that the evidence had been destroyed when it wasn't , evidence that could have been used to clear this man 11 years early .And after all this Sean Hodges is likely to have to face a year without compensation while he ;ives on benefits and when he does recieve what is rightfully his the government is going to deduct the money it cost ti incarsarate, up to 100,000 pound , this is a national disgrace

rejection.details: Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
